parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical resource id associated with the resource.

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient subject of the Procedure.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject of the Procedure(must be a patient resource).

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Initial date /starting date of the procedure.
